name: Player 9
description:
Come and witness world's most dangerous game.

You are a player in a live streamed dark-web game and your goal is to escape from the building while the guards are ordered to shoot at site!

You can hide form the guards or throw objects  to distract them

CONTROLS:

  • 'w','a','s','d To move
  • 'I' for inventory
  • 'M' to toggle Map
  • 'E' to interact
  • 'Esc' to toggle Pause
  • 'Z' to pick up
  • 'X' to throw
  • Arrow keys to rotate picked up objects.
  • Live Mini-map/Full-map for the players to keep track of their path
  • Dynamic Inventory System!
  • Interactive objects, pick up and rotate the objects for clues! or throw them too distract guards!

If you like the game, please consider rating it :)
Also let me know what you think of it @ the comment Section
